title: Remove capacity wording from Program Details and add more Oregon flower assets

requirements.text: Remove the capacity wording (“up to 8 kids” / “Limited to 8 children”) from the “Program Details” section wherever it appears on the site (including the Little Sprouts page key-details grid and the Home page Little Sprouts details card).

quotes: under program details dont say how many kids please change
no just the up to 8 kids wording should be removed

acceptanceCriteria: On /little-sprouts, the Program Details area no longer mentions any specific child capacity (the line currently reading “Limited to 8 children” is removed).
On / (Home), the Little Sprouts details card no longer mentions any specific child capacity (the line currently reading “Capacity: Limited to 8 children” is removed).
No other Program Details fields (ages/schedule/time/cost/etc.) are changed.

requirements.text: Create a few additional Oregon flower illustration assets in the same calm, minimal botanical style as the existing site decorations, and add them as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: also create a few more oregon flowers

acceptanceCriteria: At least three new Oregon-flower illustration PNGs (transparent background) are added to frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames specified in imageRequirements.required.
New assets are visually consistent with the existing nature-themed decorative art (minimal, not cartoonish).

requirements.text: Render the newly generated Oregon flower assets in the UI as additional subtle decorative elements (non-interactive, aria-hidden) in an existing decorative area so they are visible in the deployed site.

quotes: also create a few more oregon flowers

acceptanceCriteria: At least one page displays the new Oregon flower images as subtle decoration (e.g., in the Home page’s existing decorative background layer).
Decorative images do not interfere with content readability (kept low-opacity, behind content, and pointer-events disabled).
All decorative flower images have empty alt text and/or aria-hidden="true" (consistent with existing decorative assets usage).

constraints: Frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui and the immutable hook paths must not be edited; compose them instead.
Keep all backend logic in the existing single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Do not add or change registration flows, forms, or backend data models.
Do not redesign the overall site layout or navigation as part of this change.

required: Minimal Oregon white oak leaf + acorn line illustration, earthy neutral palette, transparent background (ls-oregon-flower-oak.dim_512x512.png)
Minimal Oregon grape flower cluster line illustration, earthy neutral palette, transparent background (ls-oregon-flower-oregon-grape.dim_512x512.png)
Minimal camas lily bloom line illustration, earthy neutral palette, transparent background (ls-oregon-flower-camas.dim_512x512.png)
Minimal trillium bloom line illustration, earthy neutral palette, transparent background (ls-oregon-flower-trillium.dim_512x512.png)
